content:
According to our estimates,
within <color=#8AAB4B>10 minutes</color> of the treasure chest's arrival,
everyone can find a <color=#8AAB4B>lucky bag</color> inside!
info: 钓鱼岛活动说明-公告牌_钓鱼岛

content:
Based on our observations,
the <color=#8AAB4B>Lucky Fish</color> appears at very regular intervals,
showing up every <color=#8AAB4B>half hour</color> between
<color=#8AAB4B>6:00 PM and 9:00 PM</color> on <color=#8AAB4B>Fridays and Saturdays</color>.
info: 钓鱼岛活动说明-公告牌_钓鱼岛

content:
After careful consideration,
we've decided to spread this wonderful news far and wide,
and warmly invite everyone to come join in the fun!
info: 钓鱼岛活动说明-公告牌_钓鱼岛

content:
Haine's Blessing Event Team
May everyone be destined to meet,
Have a wonderful time here!

content:
About the Hein's Blessing Event:
If you were to ask about the biggest surprise on Hein Road in the past decade,
it would definitely be the arrival of a fish that brings good fortune,
which we lovingly call the <color=#8AAB4B>Blessing Fish</color>.
info: 钓鱼岛活动说明-公告牌_钓鱼岛

content:
If someone manages to catch a Fortune Fish,
a <color=#8AAB4B>Fortune Chest</color> will appear on the <color=#8AAB4B>bridge</color>,
bestowing good fortune upon those destined to receive it.
